p: A surprising finding in this study is that the controls had exactly the same percentage of positive PCR tests (22%) as the cases, which leads us to conclude on the importance of studying GBS patients as thoroughly as available resources allow it, to investigate coinfections, particularly gastrointestinal and thus be able to establish with greater solidity the association of ZIKV with GBS and the prevalence of other potential pathogens in endemic areas of ZIKV.
